text: Parastemon is a genus of plant in the family Chrysobalanaceae described as a genus in 1842.Candolle, Alphonse Louis Pierre Pyramus de. 1842. Annales des Sciences Naturelles; Botanique, sér. 2 18: 208Tropicos, Parastemon A. DC. It is native to Southeast Asia and to Papuasia.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families ;Species # Parastemon grandifructus - Sarawak, Sabah # Parastemon urophyllus - Nicobar Islands, Thailand, Peninsular Malaysia, Borneo, Sumatra # Parastemon versteeghii - Sulawesi, Maluku, New Guinea, Admiralty Islands ==References== Category:Chrysobalanaceae Category:Chrysobalanaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Parastemon
